{
  "scenario": [
    {
      "name": "Carrot Salad",
      "ingredients": [
        "carrot",
        "red onion",
        "apple",
        "cider vinegar",
        "oil"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Chop carrot and onion into small pieces",
        "Peel and chop apple into small pieces",
        "Mix all ingredients in a bowl",
        "Drizzle cider vinegar and oil over the mixture",
        "Mix well and serve"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Carrot Cake",
      "ingredients": [
        "carrot",
        "sugar",
        "all-purpose flour",
        "baking powder",
        "baking soda",
        "eggs",
        "butter"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Grate carrot and mix with sugar",
        "Add flour, baking powder, baking soda, and eggs to the mixture",
        "Mix well and add butter",
        "Pour into a greased cake pan and bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
